diff.sql: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `dataintegrity_integrity_checks`; CREATE TABLE `dataintegrity_integrity_checks` ( `dataintegrity_integrity_check_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `check_name` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `check_type` varchar(45) NOT NULL, `check_code` varchar(1000) NOT NULL, `check_result_type` varchar(45) NOT NULL, `check_fail` varchar(45) NOT NULL, `check_fail_operator` varchar(45) NOT NULL, `check_repair_type` varchar(45) default NULL, `check_repair` varchar(1000) default NULL, `check_parameters` varchar(500) default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`dataintegrity_integrity_check_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
